Articles.Content: Is it possible to hide all threads in a forum section or subsection? I primarily use the "New Posts" link to see most recent posts, and I'm not at all interested in seeing posts from, for instance, the Forum Games or international languages sub-forums. It would be nice to be able to exclude those posts.
I don't think it is possible, no, though I guess you could try fiddling with the advanced search options to see if that will work for what you want.
